info.name: Last.fm - Sleek Dark Red 1.1.5
info.description: A red version of my modern sleek dark blue Last.fm theme.
info.additionalInfo:
06/07/12: 1.1.5 – Firefox form radius fix.
04/10/12: 1.1.4 – new search box.
04/10/12: 1.0.4 – subscribers icon optimized.
04/02/12: 1.0.3 – some fixes.
03/30/12: 1.0.2 – minor changes.
03/29/12: 1.0.1 – some bug fixes.
03/29/12: 1.0.0 – first release.
